resources.string: This game have been developed as a final thesis of my masters degree. \nSound effects have been dowloaded from http://www.freesound.org/ and music from http://www.mattmcfarland.com/
Thanks Estela for all your support and patince during this time. All those nights awake would have not been possible without you.
You cand find more information on my webpage http://www.aeonphyxius and find more about my projects at http://www.aeonphyxius/projects

Please do not hesitate to contact if you have any question or sugestion at 
 http://www.aeonphyxius.com/contact/
